ygData.subject: Re: Bard Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yup, and he can lay hands on himself a couple of times in the fight to boot. Our then L35 group died quite nastily in the bottom of that tower a few times
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Aug 18/99, "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...> wrote:
> From: "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...>
>
> Oh man he is a badass, hits for dbl 120's and is really fast. We fought him
> twice along with 2 or 3 Zols. All he dropped those times was the Tunic.
> Thanks for the info we were going to ignore him from now on because the
> Mithril tunic just wasnt that good.

Yup, and he can lay hands on himself a couple of times in the fight to
boot. Our then L35 group died quite nastily in the bottom of that tower
a few times to him. The falchion is another one of those real rare drops
Verant loves so much. :(
